note.p: Burial: St Olave's, Hart Street, London (30 March 1689)
Education: St Catharine's College, Cambridge; BA (1646), MA (1649), DD (1679)

Career: Fellow of St Catharine's; Ordained priest (1656); Rector of St Olave, Hart Street, London (1658-1689); Rector of Wanstead, Essex (1667-1689); President of Sion College (1670-1672); expelled from the Royal Society (1685)
